Text: Enron QuestionsIts Chris Murphy here from UofO I have a few questions that I forgot to ask during the interview If you have the time to answer them I would very much appreciate it Are new employees given demo accounts to paper trade the markets prior to live trading If I were to be selected I would like to begin to watch the energy markets so that I can get a feel for them Do you know of any good information and news sources that I could subscribe to in order to get charts volume open interest and other pertinent data Also do you know of any good books that are devoted exclusively to trading the energy markets I am very excited about this wonderful opportunity and I hope to be selected for Super Saturday Regards Chris
